phdl.parser
Class DeviceDeclaration

java.lang.Object
  phdl.parser.Element
      phdl.parser.Declaration
          phdl.parser.DeviceDeclaration

public class DeviceDeclaration
extends Declaration

A class that represents a device declaration in phdl. In addition to inherited fields, a device declaration has set of attribute declarations and a set of pin declarations.

Author:
Richard Black and Brad Riching
